title: What is STAGELINK?
main: Built using a robust and secure network, STAGELINK is a revolutionary utility token engineered by us, for the goal of disrupting the authoritative and bureaucratic PPV model and replacing it with a decentralised and fairly priced alternative./n/nOur long-term investors are paid a dividend for every transaction that happens on the network./n/nInvestors don't need to do anything other than hold their shares in order to earn rewards and they are given exclusive access to any developments made by our team.
